entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: The prison where the Azkaban guards are located.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who support Voldemort.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: A large hall in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students gather for meals.

entities.name: staff table
entities.description: A table in the Great Hall where the staff sits during meals.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to understand why his fellow students are not looking scared or at least discussing the terrible piece of news on the front page, and he mentions that Dumbledore is a liar.
Voldemort's worst supporters have broken out too.
Harry and Hermione are friends, as they are mentioned together in the text.
Ron is opposed to Voldemort, as he is told by Harry to stop whimpering.
